description: Create and manage chat messages with support for different senders and message storage.

message.info: Existing message object to use as input (when Use Message Input is enabled).

should_store_message.info: Whether to store the message in the chat history.

sender.info: Type of the message sender (AI or User).

session_id.info: Session ID for the chat. If empty, the current session ID will be used.

use_message_input.info: Whether to use an existing Message object as input instead of creating a new one from text.

clean_data.info: Whether to clean the text data before processing.

success.message_stored: Message successfully stored in chat history

errors.message_required: Message input is required when 'Use Message Input' is enabled.
errors.invalid_message_type: Expected Message object, got different type.
